item.description:
SPA|BAR combines services from some of the top salons, spas and cosmetic lines in the Boston area, in the new, upscale setting that is Nix’s Mate. Indulge in services like hair styling, makeup applications, massages, waxing and eye treatments while enjoying delicious libations! You can also shop from featured “must have” product lines.

We’ve also added a special edition to this month’s SPA|BAR – a Grettaluxe stylist will be on site to talk fashion, wardrobe, trends etc. with ALL guests! Get a free jean fitting to find your best style, and shop from the latest styles too.

Included with your ticket is one free service from each participating salon/spa and a complimentary drink. TICKETS ARE $10, AVAILABLE THROUGH WWW.ANTHEMEVENTS.COM
item.name: SPA-BAR @ Nix's Mate hosted by Anthem Events
